text: Væb are an Icelandic electronic music duo. The duo has brothers Hálfdán Helgi Matthíasson (born 4 June 2003) and Matthías Davíð Matthíasson (born 7 December 2004). They represented Iceland in the Eurovision Song Contest 2025 in Basel, Switzerland with the song "Róa". They finished in 25th place in the final with 33 points. ==Name== How to say their name (or pronunciation): In a February 2025 video clip, those two people said that their name is pronounced the same as [the English word], vibe. ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== Title Details Væb tékk * Released: 8 September 2022 * Label: Alda Music * Formats: Digital download, streaming ===Extended plays=== Title Details Væbauer * Released: 25 July 2024 * Label: Alda Music * Formats: Digital download, streaming ===Singles=== ====As lead artist==== Title Year Peak chart positions Album ICE Peak chart positions for Iceland: * "Ofboðslega frægur (Remix)": * "Tölur tala": * "Bíómynd": * "Róa": AUT FIN LTU Peak chart positions for Lithuania: * "Róa": NL NOR SWE UK Down.
